Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Toad
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
A squad and mortar deployment pod, the Toad is a somewhat expensive vehicle to quickly mount a siege on a nearby locale without exposing your gunners to danger. With more armour than a tank and a design made to be deployed from orbit, it makes for a semi-disposable assault vehicle.

Fuel efficiency is not the design of this vehicle, consider only deploying on short distances with enough fuel to make it back.

Being a flying vehicle, it is extremely obvious when on the move.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Operator x1, Passenger x3
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
